Description: Pottery one-handled coarse ware cooking pot or jug; wheel-made; globular bottom with a rounded base; everted rim (part missing); single handle from shoulder to rim; surface partially burnt.
Curator's comments: The date of this item clearly places it outside the sequence both of the Late Bronze Age settlement and the CG-CA sanctuary finds. If the attribution to Enkomi is correct, then it may represent otherwise undocumented Roman use of the site prior to the Byzantine phase.
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Squadron Leader Cecil Cramp
